    • Constructor Detail

      • Position

        public Position(int x,
        int y,
        int status)

        Stores a position of maze.
        Position: 0 => means position is open place.
        Position: 1 => means position is wall.
        Position: 9 => means position is end.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of the position.
        y - coordinate of the position.
        status - status of the position.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException, - if x, or y is negative, or status is not 0, 1, or 9.

    • Method Detail

        Sets the position's path status.
        Parameters:

      • isPath

        public boolean isPath()
        Returns:
        True, if the position is part of a path.

        Marks the position as visited.

      • isVisited

        public boolean isVisited()
        Returns:

        public boolean isWall()
